title: School of Hard Knockers
description: Corey just wants to have a good time at college, but Dean Bitterman is standing in his way.
quote: That youngster will make a perfect addition to my Cabinet. Secretary of Partying Down!
alt1: Corey detonates a bomb while Nerdlinger plugs his ears
alt2: Dean Bitterman and the President look up in shock as bras fall from the sky
alt4: Dean Bitterman is angry with a bra on his head
